entry.title: Time Is Relative
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Summary: Time is Relative and some people like to use it like a jump rope to fix their problems.Future Damian and Present Damian end up having a surprise meetings when their future wife faces trouble. Luckily their local time lord saves the day and now the boys have to deal with the back lash. It's not that bad, all things considered-

entry.title: The Strike Of A Villainess
entry.summary:
Author: SleepyNov

Summary: Before she could finally figure out who Hawkmoth is, Marinette is thrown into an otome game of her favorite fandom— the DC Universe! Unfortunately, that’s not all there is to it:1. To get back to her old world, she has to save this one, of course.2. Her kwamis are no where to be found! Not to say she hasn’t found ANY kwamis.3. Everyone but the dc characters seem to be based off of people in her own world, including the person she became…Oh… and did I mention that she’s the villainess? Whoopsie!(Redid the summary and tags because it was bothering me. Hope you all like it better now!)

entry.title: Peaceful, Does Not Mean Harmless
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Summary: When Damian was little, he was told that everything was a choice. Killing a spider or taking it outside? A choice to be kind.Damian took that lesson to heart and chooses to be kind. Over and over again he chooses to be kind.It's not always an easy choice, but he tries.

entry.title: Love Language: Gift Giving
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Summary: Marinette has taken to social media with her designs and ideas. Unfortunately, (or fortunately, depending on how you see it) one of her viewers has made it to where she has to be *very* careful with her words. A single mention of something she's debating on getting or that she needs to get something and boom, someone sends her a gift. They never attach a name or any identification. Marinette doesn't know who they are, but they won't. stop. sending. her. gifts.Honestly, she's getting worried about them and their bad spending habits.

entry.title: Doves
entry.summary:
Author: Ira_deLume

Summary: Leaving was a quiet affairLooking back, everything has changed"Do you regret it?"She smiled"No" Or,Marinette moves to Gotham, in search of a normal life. She knows that she cannot run from her guardian duties for long, but a short reprise in the form of college shouldn't be too unrealistic, Right?Sadly evil knows no rest because she is forced to enter heroics far too soon once she comes across one Damian Wayne in the throes of a complot after who knows what. What is their goal and what is her role in all this?Read to find out :)

entry.title: To Protect The Gods (Or To Protect My Goddess)
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

entry.title: Beneath Dense Fog
entry.summary:
Author: ExperienceNewWorlds1

Summary: Marinette was alone. So, utterly alone. Her class and family had turned on her. Her partner was harassing her. And she couldn’t even get upset because Hawkmoth would akumatize her.Benjamin wasn’t expecting to find a girl curled up in a ball in some alleyway. He definitely wasn’t expecting to see a floating red TALKING creature trying to comfort her. New to Paris, Ben doesn’t quite understand the significance, but there’s no way a girl like that should be crying alone in an alley.And Damian certainly wasn't expecting to feel a small twinge in his chest when Marinette smiled at any other boy.

entry.title: The Right Wrong Place In The Right Wrong Time
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Summary: Soulmates are rare. Everyone has one, but *meeting* your soulmate is rare. In order to meet your soulmate, you need to shift. In order to shift, you need to be perfectly in sync with your soulmate. Your hearts need to beat in sync, your movements need to be in sync, perfectly mirroring one another. A blink, a *twitch* could be the difference between meeting your soulmate and not.Damian's soulmate shifts to him at the most awkward time possible.

entry.title: My Shadow
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Summary: When Marinette was a little girl, she had a friend. He never spoke, never told her his name or anything of the sort, but he was he best friend reguardless. He always followed her everywhere, people would sometimes forget he was even there because of how silent he was. Everyone called him her shadow, matching her move for move, going where she went without a word. It was a fitting name.Shadow disappeared when Marinette turned 8, he only came back 3 years later when she was 11. He came back different, changed in ways she couldn't explain.Now, at 18 years old, Marinette needs his help. Will he answer her call?

entry.title: Eyes Like Mine
entry.summary:
Author: Intercoursefluids

Summary: After the death of Marinette's partner and husband, Marinette can't stay in Paris any longerDesperate to get out of the city that haunts her, chance leads her to the city of Gotham, where she encounters Damian Wayne.With Damian's support, Marinette finds her footing in the world once again.But one has to wonder, was it really just chance that she ended up in Gotham.
